summary: "Arrival" is a 2016 science fiction movie about a linguist, Louise Banks (played by Amy Adams), who helps the U.S. Army communicate with aliens that have landed on Earth. The film is based on a short story by Ted Chiang. It received critical acclaim and several awards, including an Oscar for Best Sound Editing. Amy Adams was also nominated for many awards for her performance. The movie explores how communication can prevent war and misunderstandings.
title: Arrival (film)
